Waltham.Beaver Brook (MBTA station): Beaver Brook is a former station on the MBTA Commuter Rail Fitchburg Line, located near Main Street east of the center of Waltham, Massachusetts. The station was named after a nearby brook of the same name. It was closed in June 1978 along with Clematis Brook on the Fitchburg Line and Winchester Highlands on the Lowell Line.
